thread.title: Dixons Carphone warns on profit, to close stores

title: Dixons Carphone warns on profit, to close stores
text:
Dixons Carphone warns on profit, to close stores 8:00am EDT - 01:08
Dixons Carphone warned profits were likely to plunge by a fifth this year and its new CEO said he would have to close shops to fix a company struggling in a difficult market for selling phones and electrical goods in Britain. Ciara Lee reports
